text:
*Kevel is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Kevel is looking for a Content Marketing Manager to join our growing marketing team! We'd love to find a seasoned content marketer who can help ideate, create, and promote content that will help Kevel grow our site traffic, effectively tell our story, and help the sales team close deals. Please reach out to me with any questions and apply using the form below. 



*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3aMlE5U>

<@U020H936NFN>

*Animalz is hiring a Content Strategist* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

We are looking for Content Strategists to manage our teams of Content Marketing Managers, as well as oversee the deliverables and expectations of multiple customers. If you love creating content strategies, managing people, and using your knowledge and experience in content marketing to help others grow, this is the perfect position for you.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/32ToNN4>

<@UM2A21SJW>

attachments.title: Content Strategist
attachments.text: New York, New York, United States
